StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetAllDistricts]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
-- from sp_GetChildOrgs SELECT ORGANIZATION_ID, SHORT_NAME, NAME, ORGANIZATION_TYPE FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'D' -- return '1MCD' with list of districts AND (ISOPEN = 'Y' OR SHORT_NAME = '1MCD') AND DELETED != 'Y' ORDER BY ORGANIZATION_ID
